trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Flint Township
There were no other sightings in Flint Township on or around April 17th 2012
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting DetailsIT WAS JUST ABOUT DARK WHEN THE FIRST OBJECT WAS VIDEOED BY ME AND NO OTHER OBJECTS WERE IN SIGHT. AS SOON AS IT GOT DARK ABOUT A DOZEN OBJECTS APPEARED AND WHEN SOME OF THEM STARTED TO COME CLOSER TO THE GROUND IS WHEN THE HELICOPTERS CAME. THE HELICOPTERS SEEMED TO BE PROTECTING THEM AND CLEARING A PATH. I SAW 2 HELICOPTERS AND THERE WERE SEVERAL PLANES FLYING IN CONCERT WITH THEM.
Summary: AFTER SENDING THE FIRST REPORT ON 4/17/12 ABOUT 20 MINUTES LATER HELICOPTERS BUZZED THE HOUSE AND SEEMED TO BE PROTECTING THE CRAFT
